reviewText: This guy is really funny. I'd seen his videos on Youtube and found out about his new DVD on his site. I mainly wanted something new to get some exercise with and this video definitely keeps up my heartbeat. I own a bunch of dance instructional videos that teach hokey moves, but this one shows you the basics of how to move. Friends are telling me I'm less clunky on the dance floor! Definitely recommend this one.

This is a great video!
I'm not a dancer but I learned a few moves for the clubs.  It's made my nights out a lot more fun.  Oh and it a great workout too.
